hints.content: On the number line, we start at $652$ and move **left** $\purpleC{600}$, then $\blueD{40}$ more.

The answer:

![A number line that has, moving left to right, tick marks at 12, 52, and 652. A green circle appears on the number line at tick mark 12. A black circle appears on the number line at tick mark 652. A purple arrow above the number line labeled minus 600 begins at 652 and ends at 52. A blue arrow above the number line labeled minus 40 begins at 52 and ends at 12.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2c55b44569d635fddcbfa2187f7ec8fc79ae7c16)
